name: ColorLoupe
description: An sp-color-loupe shows the output color that would otherwise be covered by a cursor, stylus, or finger during color selection.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: The color to display in the loupe

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Controls whether the loupe is visible

examples.title: Basic Color Loupe
examples.description: A standard color loupe positioned above a color selection area
